src:
Sastavi iz Mančestera: Zdjelar i Šćekić od prvog minuta, Marsijal i Rašford napadaju Partizan
07 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Zile
Ole Gunar Solskjer i Savo Milošević odredili su startne postave za večerašnji duel na „Old Trafordu“.
Trener crno-belih izveo je očekivan tim, od prvog minuta zaigraće Zdjelar i Šćekić, dok će Zoran Tošić meč početi na klupi.
Za Partizan će igrati Stojković, Urošević, Pavlović, Ostojić, Miletić, Zdjelar, Šćekić, Asano, Natho, Suma i Sadik.
Sa druge strane Norvežanin je napravio nekoliko promena u odnosu na meč u Humskoj, od prvog minuta zaigraće Rašford i Marsijal, šansu je dobio i Mejson Grinvud, a u timu je i kapiten Ešli Jang.
„Crveni đavoli“ će igrati u sastavu Romero, Jang, Megvajer, Roho, Van-Bisaka, MekTomini, Fred, Rašford, Mata, Grinvud i Marsijal. Utakmica počinje u 21 sat.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Manchester squad: Zdjelar and Scekic from the first minute, Marsial and Rushford attack Partizan
07 Nov 2019, 19:15 by Zile
Ole Gunar Solskjer and Savo Milosevic have set the starting lineup for tonight's Old Traford duel.
The Black and Whites coach took the expected team, from the first minute Zdjelar and Scekic will play, while Zoran Tosic will start the match on the bench.
Partizan will play Stojkovic, Urosevic, Pavlovic, Ostojic, Miletic, Zdjelar, Scekic, Asano, Natho, Suma and Sadik.
On the other hand, the Norwegian has made several changes to the match in Humska, from the first minute Rushford and Marsial will play, Mason Greenwood was given the chance, and captain Ashley Young was on the team.
The Red Devils will star in Romero, Young, Megwayer, Roho, Van Bisaka, McTomini, Fred, Rushford, Mata, Greenwood and Marsial. The match starts at 9pm.
